snippet.title: A Day - ANNOUNCEMENT TRAILER
snippet.description:
-Visit https://aday-game.com for more info-

Write the story of this relaxing town and give purpose to its inhabitants!

In A Day you'll be able to control 8 different characters in a 2D side-scrolling open map. Give them life by chaining their actions and reach for the highest score possible, and don't forget:

This day is yours to make!
